package.name: (V) Gaming Carriers
package.shortDescription: I've been having these weird thoughts lately... Is any of this for real? Or not?

descriptionlist.description: Gaming Carrier Pack, contains: Assassin's Creed logos, Half Life/Black Mesa logos, Bungie, Blizzard, Dice, Playstation, OpTic Gaming, Steam and more! More to come too!

changelog.change: Added: The Witcher 3 Wild Hunt, Red Dead Redemption and God of War
